transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+4% Ally Team Critical Damage
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+4% Ally Team Critical Damage
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Requiem
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>. Increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> if the target was a Fire enemy.
description: Attacks an enemy and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000019_1_1]</color>. Increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000019_1_3]</color> if the target was a Fire enemy.

SKT_SECOND.name: Shura Slash
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies.\nThis attack always deals <color=#28d9ed>advantageous damage</color>. Resets cooldown if the caster has a buff.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases damage\nReduces Doujikiri Yasutsuna Cooldown by 1 turn

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nIncreased damage (With additional increased damage against Fire enemies)

description: Attacks all enemies.\nThis attack always deals <color=#28d9ed>advantageous damage</color>. Resets cooldown if the caster has a buff.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Doujikiri Yasutsuna
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: When using this skill, <color=#28d9ed>increases</color> the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies.\nEach time <color=#28d9ed>Doujikiri Yasutsuna</color> is used increases <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> by <color=#28d9ed>7%</color>. (Max 3 stacks)
description: When using this skill, <color=#28d9ed>increases</color> the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000019_3_1] turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies.\nEach time <color=#28d9ed>Doujikiri Yasutsuna</color> is used increases <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000019_3_2]</color>. (Max 3 stacks)

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: The caster's Skill Chain attacks always have elemental advantage.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: The caster's Skill Chain attacks always have elemental advantage.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000019_backup_1_1]</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
